title: Your appeal has been submitted

next.heading: What happens next
next.notify: We’ll notify DWP of your appeal. They have until <DATE GOES HERE> to respond. We’ll contact you and explain the next steps when they reply.
next.contact: The tribunal may need to contact you and ask you some additional questions. It’s important that you reply as soon as you can if they do.

email: You’ll get an email and text message from us within 3 working days. This will have a link so you can track your appeal online.
download: Download, view or print a copy of your appeal submission
